`` In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come,'' Eric Schmidt said. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, Page said.`` Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him.'' CEO title at Google to cofounder Larry Page NEW YORK( CNNMoney)-- Google CEO Eric Schmidt will step down from his role as Google's CEO in April and be replaced by co-founder Larry Page. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a prepared statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.''
